import React from 'react' import { Routes, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Members from './pages/Members' import Schedules from './pages/Schedules' import Payments from './pages/Payments' import Bills from './pages/Bills' import Repairs from './pages/Repairs' import Login from './pages/Login' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import { logout, getAccess } from './services/auth' import { useNotifications } from './hooks/useNotifications' export default function App(){ const [token, setToken] = useState(Boolean(getAccess())) const navigate = useNavigate() useNotifications() // Connect to WebSocket and listen for real-time updates const handleLogout = () => { logout() setToken(false) navigate('/login') } return (
